data.title: Top 15 hottest Spanish actors that you can't take your eyes off them
data.meta_description: The HOTTEST SPANISH ACTORS continue to win the hearts of numerous fans worldwide, thanks to their looks and skills. Which actors made it on the list? Find out
data.text:
Spanish actors are some of the most good looking and charming men in entertainment. Their smart and dashing looks shine high when they appear on the screens. So, who are these hottest Spanish actors who have won the hearts of fans worldwide?

The list below will come in handy if you are looking for the hottest Spanish actors. Interestingly, most of these actors are people you are familiar with. This is because you have watched them act in various films and television series.

15 hottest Spanish actors

The entertainment industry is full of admirable actors. These actors are won the hearts of fans because of their good looks and acting skills. Below is a comprehensive list of hot Latino men and Spanish actors

1. Álvaro Antonio García Pérez

Álvaro Antonio García Pérez, known professionally as Álvaro Morte, is one of the most handsome Hispanic actors. He gained worldwide recognition playing Sergio "El Profesor" Marquina in Money Heist (La Casa De Papel). He has won and been nominated for various awards for the role.

Alvaro was born on February 23rd, 1975, in Algeciras, Spain. He began his acting career in 2002 and has been active ever since. He is a husband to Blanca Clemente and a father of two children.

2. Itzan Escamilla

Itzan Escamilla kicked off his career in 2016, and he has done many Spanish television soaps and films. He is ranked among the sexy Hispanic guys. He has a perfect face cut, sharp jawline and honey brown eyes.

Escamilla was born in Madrid on October 31st, 1997. The young actor is best known for his role as Samuel García Domínguez in the Netflix series, Elite. He is also an Instagram star and social media personality.

3. Alex Garcia

Alex Garcia is another Spanish actor touted among the most handsome. His killer looks and fantastic personality are enough to impress anyone. He was born November 14th, 1981, in San Cristóbal de La Laguna, Spain.

Alex began acting when he was 22 years old and has won numerous accolades for his roles. He is best known for his role in the 2015 film The Bride.

4. Jamie Lorente Lopez

Jamie Lorente plays the role of Denver in the Spanish heist series La Casa De Papel. He was born on December 12th, 1991, in Murcia, Spain. He spent most of his childhood in Murcia before moving to Madrid to pursue acting.

5. Diego Andrés González Boneta

Diego Boneta is touted as one of the hottest Mexican actors. He gained recognition for starring in the Netflix series Luis Miguel: The Series. He is also a singer.

How old is Diego Boneta? He was born on November 29th 1990, in Mexico City, Mexico. He will turn 31 years on November 29th, 2021.

6. Diego Luna Alexander

You can not have a list of hot Mexican actors without the name Diego Luna on it. The Mexican actor, singer, director, and producer is handsome and has an impressive personality. He was born on December 29th, 1979, in Mexico City, Mexico, to Alejandro Luna and Fiona Alexander.

What is Diego Luna known for? He is famous because of his childhood telenovela work acting in Y tu mamá también. He is also known for his roles in Rudo y Cursi and Milk.

7. Jan Cornet

Jan is an actor known for his role in The Skin I Live, Red Lights, and Risen. His dusty eyes and blonde features are irresistible for most ladies. He was born on February 24th, 1982, in Barcelona, Spain.

Cornet is seen in many Spanish movies, and the latest is Estoy Vivo, which was released in 2019. He won a Goya Award for his role as Vicente in Pedro Almodóvar's The Skin I Live In.

8. Alex Gonzalez

Alex Gonzalez's TV career took off with Un Paso Adelante, where he played the role of UFO. Before then, he acted in short films and played a minor role in Hospital Central. He was born on August 13th, 1980, in Terrassa (Barcelona), Spain.

Alex has some very sharp features like cat-eye, a sharp jawline, and perfect abs. He has stolen the heart of many ladies all around the globe. No one seems to get enough of him.

9. Javier Ángel Encinas Bardem

Javier Bardem won the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor for his role as Anton Chigurh in No Country for Old Men. He began acting in 1990 and has been active since then. His extra alluring looks and dashing personality ranks him among the handsome Latino actors.

Javier was born in Las Palmas de Gran Canaria on March 1st, 1969. He is the son of actress Pilar Bardem and nephew to filmmaker Juan Antonio Bardem.

10. Pau Maso

Pau Maso is a renowned Spanish actor, film director, producer, writer, and model. He made his cameo in Aleksandr’s Price. He wrote, directed and produced the film.

He also features as a leading actor in the movie. Most of the films he acted are written and produced by him. Apart from his talents, his looks are appealing to people's eyes.

11. Maximiliano Teodoro Iglesias Acevedo

Maximiliano's captivating sandy eyes have won the hearts of millions. He gained prominence following his appearance in Hospital Central, which was released in 2005. He has also acted in many Spanish movies.

Maxi Iglesia was born on February 6th, 1991, in Madrid, Spain. Apart from being an actor, he is also a model and television presenter. He has all chocolate boy features that make him a masterpiece.

12. Mario Casas Sierra

The Spanish actor is best known for his role as Ulises Garmendia in the series The Boat. He was born on June 12th, 1986, in A Coruna, Spain. He began acting when he was 18 and made his international debut as Aitor Carrasco in Los hombres de Paco.

Mario is famous for his looks and acting skills. As a child, he did commercials for the brands Maggi, Boomer, and Tele Pizza.

13. Miguel Herran

Miguel Herran has cute dimples that are luring to most women globally. He is popularly known as Rio from the drama series Money Heist. He has also acted in many Spanish films, which has earned many appreciations worldwide.

How old is Miguel Herrán? The actor was born on April 25th, 1996, in Málaga, Spain. As of 2021, he is 25 years old.

14. Miguel Silvestre

You can never miss Miguel Silvestre in the list of hottest Spanish actors because he has it all. He is best known for his role in Velvet as Alberto Marquez. However, he has also acted as Lito Rodríguez and Franklin Jurado in Sense8 and Narcos.

Miguel was born on April 6th, 1982, in Castellón de la Plana, Spain. He is getting roles in many Spanish dramas and also on international platforms.

15. Eduardo Verástegui

Eduardo Verástegui was born on May 21st, 1974, in Mante, Tamaulipas, Mexico. He is an actor, producer, businessman and philanthropist. He is touted as one of the hottest Latino actors.

He founded a production company called Metanoia Films in 2014. The company's objective is to produce films that not only entertain but also make a difference.

The Spanish entertainment industry has many good looking actors. The names in the above list represent some of the hottest Spanish actors you will come across on your screen. Some of them you may be family with because they have prominently in popular projects.

Elsewhere, Tuko.co.ke also compiled a list of meanest celebrities in real life. Celebrities are either loved or hated. But despite their nature or the attitude they portray in real life, they are human and can sometimes be jerks.

Like most people, celebrities have their rough sides. Of course, you may never know what someone is going through behind closed doors. However, some entertainers do not have an excellent reputation.

Source: TUKO.co.ke
